me.text:
Hola! I was born on 05 January 2000 in Indonesia and I am
Living in Sidoarjo.

jobs.name: Exercism
tasks: Providing guidance and mentoring to junior programmers in facing complex task and projects.
Asisting junior programmers in improving their technical skills, such as programming, testing, and code management.
Offering emotional support to junior programmers, such as providing encouragement, motivation, and addressing self-doubt.
Providing feedback, this feedback can help junior programmers understand areas that need improvement and grow as a programmer.
jobs.quote: My main goals is to assist junior programmers in developing their skills, knowledge, and career as a competent and experienced programmer.

jobs.name: Investree
jobs.role: Project-Based Intern : Fullstack Developer Virtual Experience - Internship
tasks: Finishing tasks Restful API using Laravel Passport & Building a simple Blog using Laravel Framework and Implement to Laravel UI.
Build Rest API and oauth token using Laravel Framework ( Laravel Passport ).
Implement blade features as well as Laravel UI into the project.

jobs.name: Kamar Pelajar
tasks: Add features on the website Kamar Pelajar using framework Laravel.
Make daily and weekly reports using trello.
